page.title: 12ENTERPRISE ZONE (CONTINUED)
page.content: By July 1985 forty sites have been occupied with another 23 awaiting occupation. Wellingborough has improving links through new{roads, {rail}and{air}(Sywell airport 3 miles distant). { TNT The manager of this firm was interviewed and provided this information. The firm moved here because of the rates free period allowed by the council, the good road linkage and because of the space available for development. About 150 people are employed during a day shift with others working a night shift to keep the depot working around the clock. All the employees come from this area. There are 34 lorries which carry almost anything which is transportable. Goods are delivered all over Britain and Ireland.
